threads: .⁦@AOC⁩ is it a “crime against humanity” when ⁦@POTUS⁩ secretly flies migrants into Westchester (the place you grew up)? The crime here is allowing the continued flow of illegal immigration, human trafficking and drugs. It has to stop!
text: @conservative The real crime against humanity is how the rich exploit borders to sow division amongst the working class. Migrants are fleeing conditions often worsened by our own capitalist policies. Let's address the root causes, not vilify those seeking a better life.  ✊🌹
